I will zip it and give it to Michael.

The problem is that two jobs are trying to populate the same file revision in 
local file contents cache at the same time. One is reading while the other is 
writting. There are two issues here:

1) The RemoteFile handle should know that it is being used to fetch the 
contents and should not access the cached contents

2) A job should not be able to access cached contents until it is completely 
written

Olivier, you may want to cancel/discard some of your Merges. They stick around 
until you explicitly cancel them (using the button on the far right of the 
toolbar)

The RemoteContentsCache has been modified to have RemoteContentsCacheEntries.
This was done to support concurrent writting and also to support the caching of
syncBytes (to solve another problem).
*** Bug 46626 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
